name: pnp-upload-local-files-and-folder
title: Upload local files and folders to SharePoint Online
shortDescription: This script shows how you can use the CLI to upload files located on a local folder to a SharePoint Online library.
longDescription: This script shows how you can use the CLI to upload files located on a local folder to a SharePoint Online library or subfolder. This is a simple script that could be used for simple data migration scenarios. The given example uploads to the given site to Shared Documents library all files and sub folders of ./import local folder

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
